channel.title: CVE Feed for vasyltech -- Advanced Access Manager – Restricted Content, Users & Roles, Enhanced Security and More
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vasyltech -- Advanced Access Manager – Restricted Content, Users & Roles, Enhanced Security and More

item.title: CVE-2019-25213|2024-10-16T06:43:32.214Z -- vasyltech -- advanced%20access%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20restricted%20content%2C%20users%20%26%20roles%2C%20enhanced%20security%20and%20more
item.description: The Advanced Access Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Unauthenticated Arbitrary File Read in versions up to, and including, 5.9.8.1 due to insufficient validation on the aam-media parameter. This allows unauthenticated attackers to read any file on the server, including sensitive files such as wp-config.php
